summary: Feature request to add workflow history replay capability to the TypeScript SDK. This is a critical feature for debugging workflows by replaying exported history from tctl and Temporal web, similar to other SDKs.
userImpact: Users cannot replay exported workflow histories for debugging purposes, limiting their ability to troubleshoot workflow behavior issues.
proposedFix: Expose a convenient API in the TypeScript SDK to replay workflow history against a given Worker, leveraging mock pollers in the core.
resolutionDetails: Implemented history replay capability in the TypeScript SDK by exposing a convenient API that uses core mock pollers.
keyQuote: Other SDKs have the ability to replay exported Workflow history, this is a critical feature for Workflow debuggability.
